seo_keywords: Shark NV360 brush roll indicator red

problems.title: Hose Split near Handle
problems.description: Hissing noise and loss of suction at the wand.
solution_steps: This is a known weak point.
Replace the entire handle/hose assembly (it snaps right in).

problems.title: Loss of Suction
solution_steps: Check the lower hose on the floor nozzle.

faqs.question: Is it worth fixing the issue on a Navigator Lift-Away Deluxe (NV360)?
faqs.answer: Yes. A replacement part typically costs significantly less than a new $576 vacuum, and extending the life of your Shark is eco-friendly.

faqs.question: How do I know if my Navigator Lift-Away Deluxe (NV360) needs a new part?
faqs.answer: Common signs include strange noises and the device failing to complete a cleaning cycle.

faqs.question: Can I replace the part on my Navigator Lift-Away Deluxe (NV360) myself?
faqs.answer: Yes, this is a user-serviceable repair. Most replacements generally require just a screwdriver and about 10-20 minutes of time.
